name: organisation
label::English: Name of organisation of enumerator/data collector

name: organisation_other
label::English: Name of organisation of enumerator/data collector

name: enumerator
label::English: Enumerator ID

name: A
label::English: Introduction

name: consent
label::English: My name is [[name]]. We are conducting an assessment on behalf of REACH Initiative and Norwegian Refugee Council. The objective is to learn about your access to livelihoods and housing, land, and property issues you experience, so that NGOs can provide you with better information and services. Any information that you provide will be confidential and anonymous. This is voluntary and you can choose not to answer any or all of the questions; however we hope that you will participate since your views are important.  Do you have any questions? Are you willing to be interviewed?

name: region
label::English: In which region is the interview taking place?

name: province
label::English: In which province is the interview taking place?

name: district
label::English: In which district is the interview taking place?

name: village
label::English: In which village is the interview taking place?

name: village_other
label::English: In which village is the interview taking place?

name: urban
label::English: Is the interview taking place in an urban area, which is densely populated?

name: informal_settlement
label::English: Is the interview taking place in an informal settlement, where a group of households do not have an official permission to live or build?

name: follow_up_consent
label::English: Do you agree to be contacted for any follow up questions regarding this assessment?

name: respondent_telephone
label::English: What is a telephone number we can contact you at if we have any further questions?
hint::English: Put -99 if the respondent does not want to provide a telephone number or does not have one.
constraint_message::English: Must be a valid 10-digit Afghanistan telephone number

name: B
label::English: Displacement & Impact

name: displacement_note
label::English: Note: In the next section we will talk about past movements within Afghanistan and/or to  other countries. Please answer the questions, considering the expeirence of the majority of the household, not just the one of the household head.

name: refugees
label::English: Are the majority of the household members non-Afghan nationals that were forced to flee from Pakistan to Afghanistan (due to conflict or natural disaster)?
constraint_message::English: Refugees are not relevant for this province. Are you sure this is a refugee household? If yes, please interview a different household.

name: area_origin
label::English: Is the current home of the household (where the interview is taking place), the area of origin of the majority of the household members?

name: displacement
label::English: Have the majority of the household members been previously forced to displace, and since returned to their area of origin?
constraint_message::English: Internally displaced returnees are not relevant for this province. Are you sure this is an internally displaced returnee household? if yes, please interview another household.

name: external_displacement
label::English: Have the majority of the household members been previously forced to leave Afghanistan and go to another country, and since returned to Afghanistan?

name: displaced_returnees
label::English: Since their return to Afghanistan, has the majority of the household always resided in the current location (where the interview is taking place), or have they since been displaced within Afghanistan again?

name: displacement_status
calculation: if(${refugees} = "yes", "refugees", if(${area_origin} = "yes", if(${displacement} = "cross_border_returnees", "cross_border_returnees", if(${displacement} = "idp_returnees", "idp_returnees", "non_displaced")), if(${external_displacement} = "idp", "idp", if(${displaced_returnees} = "idp", "idp", "cross_border_returnees"))))

name: prev_displacement
label::English: Aside from your most recent displacement to your current location (either from another country or within Afghanistan), has the majority of your household been forcibly displaced before this as well?

name: prev_displacement_num
label::English: How many times has your household been forcibly displaced within Afghanistan or to another country, including your most recent displacement to your current location?
constraint_message::English: Number of times displaced must be between 2 and 30.

name: b1
label::English: Non-displaced households

name: host_community
label::English: Do you live in a community that hosts displaced households?

name: host_hh
label::English: Does your household host displaced individuals within your household?

name: host_hh_num
label::English: If yes, how many displaced individuals do you host in your household?
constraint_message::English: Number of displaced individuals hosted must be between 1 and 30.

name: b2
label::English: Refugee households

name: refugee_displace_season
label::English: In which season did your household leave its country of origin to seek refuge in Afghanistan?

name: refugee_displace_year
label::English: How many years ago did your household leave its country of origin to seek refuge in Afghanistan?
hint::English: If it was the most recent ${refugee_displace_season}, then put 0, then add 1 for each previous year. The current summer counts as the most recent summer.
constraint_message::English: Cannot be negative or greater than 50.

name: b3
label::English: Cross border returnee households

name: cb_return_displace_season
label::English: In which season were the majority of your household members forced to leave Afghanistan the last time?

name: cb_return_displace_year
label::English: How many years ago did the majority of your household members forced to leave Afghanistan the last time?
hint::English: If it was the most recent ${cb_return_displace_season}, then put 0, then add 1 for each previous year. The current summer counts as the most recent summer.
constraint_message::English: Cannot be negative or greater than 50.

name: cb_return_return_season
label::English: In which season did the majority of your household leave its previous location in another country, to return to Afghanistan?

name: cb_return_return_year
label::English: How many years ago did the majority of your household leave its previous location in another country, to return to Afghanistan?
hint::English: If it was the most recent ${cb_return_return_season}, then put 0, then add 1 for each previous year. The current summer counts as the most recent summer.
constraint_message::English: Cannot be negative or greater than 50.

name: cb_displacement_country
label::English: Which country did the majority of your household most recently reside in, before arriving in ${survey_village}?

name: cb_return_documentation
label::English: For returnee households, do you have documentation that allowed you to stay in the country of your previous residence? If yes, can you show it?

name: cb_return_push_factors
label::English: What factors affected your most recent displacement from Afghanistan to another country?
constraint_message::English: Cannot select "I don't know or I don't want to answer" and other options.

name: cb_return_main_push
label::English: If you had to choose a single factor that you consider to have been the final push that made you leave Afghanistan, which of the ones you just named as reasons for leaving, would you choose?

name: cb_return_decision
label::English: When deciding to return to your current location in Afghanistan, did you feel mostly forced to leave your previous location abroad or rather drawn to return to Afghanistan independently?

name: cb_return_forced_how
label::English: What was the reason you felt forced to leave your previous location?
constraint_message::English: Cannot select "I don't know or I don't want to answer" and other options.

name: cb_return_independent_why
label::English: What was the reason that made you decide to return to Afghanistan independently?
constraint_message::English: Cannot select "I don't know or I don't want to answer" and other options.

name: b4
label::English: IDP households

name: idp_displace_hamal
label::English: Did the majority of your household forcibly displace from its previous location in Afghanistan, before or after the latest Hamal or Now Ruz?

name: idp_displ_before_hamal
label::English: Did the majority of your household displace more than 2 months before the latest Hamal or Nowruz or less than 2 months before the latest Hamal or Now Ruz?

name: recent_idp_note
label::English: This is a recent IDP household

name: non_recent_idp_note
label::English: This is a non-recent IDP household.

name: idp_displ_season
label::English: In which season was the majority of your household forcibly displaced from its previous location in Afghanistan to ${survey_village}?

name: idp_displ_year
label::English: How many years ago was the majority of your household forcibly displaced from its previous location in Afghanistan to ${survey_village}?
hint::English: If it was the most recent ${idp_displ_season}, then put 0, then add 1 for each previous year. The current summer counts as the most recent summer.
constraint: not((selected(${idp_displ_season}, "summer") or selected(${idp_displ_season}, "spring")) and . = 0) and . >= 0 and . <= 50
constraint_message::English: Cannot put 0 since you selected summer/spring, this would be less 2 months since the latest Hamal or Now Ruz. Cannot be negative or greater than 50.

name: idp_prev_province
label::English: In which province was the majority of your household residing before arriving in your current location?

name: idp_prev_district
label::English: In which district was the majority of your household residing before arriving in your current location?

name: idp_push_factors
label::English: What factors affected this most recent displacement of the majority of your household to ${survey_village}? Multiple options possible.
constraint: not(selected(., "poverty") and count-selected(.) = 1) and not(selected(., "service_access") and count-selected(.) = 1) and not(selected(., "poverty") and selected(., "service_access") and count-selected(.) = 2) and not(selected(., "no_answer") and count-selected(.) > 1)
constraint_message::English: Please note that this is not an IDP household, if they were only displaced to access services or better employment. Cannot select "I don't know or I don't want to answer" and other options.

name: idp_main_push
label::English: If you had to choose a single factor that you consider to have been the final push that made your household displace, which of the ones you just named as reasons for leaving, would you choose?

name: b5
label::English: IDP returnees

name: idp_return_push_factors
label::English: What factors affected your most recent displacement from your AoO?
constraint_message::English: Cannot select "I don't know or I don't want to answer" and other options.

name: idp_return_main_push
label::English: If you had to choose a single factor that you consider to have been the final push that made you leave your AoO previously, which of the ones you just named as reasons for leaving, would you choose?

name: idp_return_pull_factors
label::English: What was the reason that made you decide to return to your area of origin?
constraint_message::English: Cannot select "I don't know or I don't want to answer" and other options.

name: returnee_incidents
label::English: When you returned to your community did you experience any of the following?
constraint_message::English: Cannot select "None of the above" and other options.

name: b7
label::English: Events

name: events_note
label::English: Note: Aside from any displacement, now we will briefly talk about any major events that your household may have experienced, or not, in the last year.

name: major_events
label::English: Has the majority of your household directly experienced any major conflict or natural disaster events in the past year? Multiple answers possible.
constraint_message::English: Cannot select "None of the above" and other options.

name: livestock_impact
label::English: Did this/these events have a negative impact on any owned livestock at the time?

name: livestock_impact_how
label::English: What exactly have been the negative impacts noted on livestock due to the shock event?

name: agricultural_impact
label::English: Did this/these event/events have a negative impact on any owned agricultural production at the time?

name: agricultural_impact_how
label::English: By how much do you think the agricultural production decrease due to the shock event?

name: other_impact
label::English: Did this/these events impact your household in any other way?
constraint_message::English: Cannot select "None of the above" and other options.

name: b8
label::English: Future plans

name: future_plans_note
label::English: Note: Now we will talk about the future plans, of the majority of the household.

name: idp_returnee_intentions
label::English: What are the majority of your household's current movement intentions for the next six months?

name: return_aoo_factors
label::English: What are the main reasons why you currently intend to return to your area of origin?
constraint_message::English: Cannot select more than 3 responses.

name: return_aoo_needs
label::English: What are your household's main needs that would help your household return to your area of origin?
constraint_message::English: Cannot select "None" and other options.

name: aoo_intentions
label::English: What are the majority of your household's current movement intentions for the next six months?

name: C
label::English: Household composition, situation, and education

name: household_note
label::English: Now we will talk a bit about the general composition and siutation of your household.

name: hh_size
label::English: How many individuals are living in the household?
constraint_message::English: Most be greater than 0 and 30 or less

name: hoh_sex
label::English: Sex of head of household:

name: hoh_age
label::English: Age of head of household:
hint::English: Age should be provided in years.
constraint_message::English: head of household must be at least 15 years of age

name: hoh_joined
label::English: Did this person join the household after the beginning of Ramadan this year?

name: Education_hoh
label::English: Education

name: current_year_enrolled_hoh
label::English: Was this individual enrolled in formal schooling or CBE in the most recent school year?

name: current_year_attending_hoh
label::English: Did this individual attend formal schooling or CBE at least 3 days per week in the most recent school year?

name: previous_year_enrolled_hoh
label::English: Was this individual enrolled in formal schooling or CBE in the previous school year?

name: edu_removal_shock_hoh
label::English: Were they removed from school in the past year due to event/shock? (e.g. school was closed or damaged due to conflict or natural disaster)
constraint_message::English: Cannot select "None of the above" and other options.

name: hh_member_loop_note
label::English: We will now ask you about each other household member. Start with the youngest member of the household and go to the oldest.'

name: c1
label::English: Other household member information

name: hh_member_sex
label::English: Sex of household member #${hh_member}:

name: hh_member_age
label::English: Age of household member #${hh_member}:
hint::English: Age should be provided in years. Put 0 if the child has not reached their first birthday.
constraint_message::English: Household member cannot be age less than 0 or greater than 130

name: hh_member_joined
label::English: Did this person join the household after the beginning of Ramadan this year?

name: hh_member_born
label::English: Was this person born on or after the beginning of Ramadan this year?

name: hh_member_6_months
label::English: Is this person older than 6 months?

name: c1_1
label::English: Education

name: current_year_enrolled
label::English: Was this individual enrolled in formal schooling or CBE in the most recent school year?

name: current_year_attending
label::English: Did this individual attend formal schooling or CBE at least 3 days per week in the most recent school year?

name: previous_year_enrolled
label::English: Was this individual enrolled in formal schooling or CBE in the previous school year?

name: edu_removal_shock
label::English: Were they removed from school in the past year due to event/shock? (e.g. school was closed or damaged due to conflict or natural disaster)
constraint_message::English: Cannot select "None of the above" and other options.

name: unattending_female_no_shock
calculation: if((selected(${edu_removal_shock}, "no") or (selected(${current_year_enrolled}, "no") and selected(${previous_year_enrolled}, "no"))) and selected(${hh_member_sex}, "female"), "1", "0")

name: unattending_male_no_shock
calculation: if((selected(${edu_removal_shock}, "no") or (selected(${current_year_enrolled}, "no") and selected(${previous_year_enrolled}, "no"))) and selected(${hh_member_sex}, "male"), "1", "0")

name: unattending_female_no_shock_total
calculation: sum(${unattending_female_no_shock}) + if((selected(${edu_removal_shock_hoh}, "no") or (selected(${current_year_enrolled_hoh}, "no") and selected(${previous_year_enrolled_hoh}, "no"))) and selected(${hoh_sex}, "female"), "1", "0")

name: unattending_male_no_shock_total
calculation: sum(${unattending_male_no_shock}) + if((selected(${edu_removal_shock_hoh}, "no") or (selected(${current_year_enrolled_hoh}, "no") and selected(${previous_year_enrolled_hoh}, "no"))) and selected(${hoh_sex}, "male"), "1", "0")

name: hoh_check_note
label::English: To check, the head of household is a ${hoh_age} year old  ${hoh_sex}? If this is incorrect, please go back and change the first repeat entry to be the head of household.

name: c2
label::English: Education

name: boy_unattendance_reason
label::English: What were the reason the ${unattending_male_no_shock_total} boys were not enrolled in school, since not due to shock?

name: girl_unattendance_reason
label::English: What were the reason the ${unattending_female_no_shock_total} girls were not enrolled in school, since not due to shock?

name: religious_attendance
label::English: Are any of the ${unattending_no_shock_total} children not attending formal school or community based education attending religious school instead?

name: hoh_marital_status
label::English: What is the marital status of the Head of Household?

name: wg_seeing
label::English: Does the household head have difficulty seeing even if wearing glasses?

name: wg_hearing
label::English: Does the household head have difficulty hearing even using a hearing aid?

name: wg_walking
label::English: Does the household head have any difficult walking or climbing steps?

name: wg_memory
label::English: Does the houshold head have any difficulty remembering or concentrating?

name: wg_selfcare
label::English: Does the household head have any difficulty with self care, such as washing or dressing?

name: wg_communicating
label::English: Using your usual language, does the household head have any difficulty communicating for example, understanding or being understood?

name: chronic_illness
label::English: Does the household head have any chronic illnesses?

name: pregnant
label::English: How many individuals in the household are pregnant?
constraint_message::English: Cannot be negative or greater than the total number of females aged 11 to 59 in the household, ${females_11_59_total}.

name: lactating
label::English: How many individuals in the household are lactating?
constraint_message::English: Cannot be negative or greater than the total number of females aged 11 to 59 in the household, ${females_11_59_total}.

name: highest_edu
label::English: What is the highest education level achieved by a current household members?

name: female_literacy
label::English: How many female members of the household over the age of 10 can read and write?
constraint_message::English: Cannot be negative or greater than the total number of females in the household over the age of 10, ${literacy_age_female_total}.

name: male_literacy
label::English: How many male members of the household over the age of 10 can read and write?
constraint_message::English: Cannot be negative or greater than the total number of males in the household over the age of 10, ${literacy_age_male_total}.

name: boy_marriage
label::English: Are any boys (under the age of 16) in your household married?

name: girl_marriage
label::English: Are any girls (under the age of 16) in your household married?

name: adult_behavior_change
label::English: Have any adults in your household developed any of the following changes in behavior in the past year? If they have experienced any, select yes.
hint::English:
New/repeated complaints about headaches or upset stomach.
Repeated nightmares or bedwetting.
Excessive (more than usual) emotional outbursts (crying, screaming, aggression).
Changes in appetite or eating habits.
Social isolation or inability to be alone.
Substance/drug use/abuse.

name: child_behavior_change
label::English: Have any children in your household developed any of the following changes in behavior in the past year? If they have experienced any, select yes.
hint::English:
New/repeated complaints about headaches or upset stomach.
Repeated nightmares or bedwetting.
Excessive (more than usual) emotional outbursts (crying, screaming, aggression).
Changes in appetite or eating habits.
Social isolation or inability to be alone.
Substance/drug use/abuse.

name: behavior_change_cause
label::English: Do you believe these changes in behaviour were a result of experiencing conflict activities?

name: psychosocial_access
label::English: Have these person(s) accessed psychosocial or mental health services?

name: D
label::English: Livelihoods

name: livelihoods_note
label::English: In the following couple of questions we will talk about your household livelihoods. Please remember none of the personal data will be shared with anyone.

name: adults_working
label::English: How many adults 18+ years worked outside of the household in the last 30 days?
constraint_message::English: Cannot be negative or greater than the total number of adults in the household, ${adult_18_plus_total}.

name: children_working
label::English: How many children between the age of 11-17 worked outside of the household in the last 30 days?
constraint_message::English: Cannot be negative or greater than the total number of children between 11 and 17 in the household, ${child_worker_age}.

name: children_work_safety
label::English: Are the children working outside of the household, involved in work or activities that puts their health or safety at risk?

name: d1
label::English: Income

name: income_note
label::English: What was your household's total income in AFN over the last 30 days from the following sources:

name: ag_income
label::English: Agriculture (selling of own production)
constraint_message::English: Cannot be less than 500 (unless equal to 0) or greater than 100,000AFN.

name: livestock_income
label::English: Livestock (selling of own production)
constraint_message::English: Cannot be less than 500 (unless equal to 0) or greater than 100,000AFN.

name: rent_income
label::English: Rent
constraint_message::English: Cannot be less than 500 (unless equal to 0) or greater than 100,000AFN.

name: small_business_income
label::English: Small business (sewing, shoe repair, etc.)
constraint_message::English: Cannot be less than 500 (unless equal to 0) or greater than 100,000AFN.

name: unskill_labor_income
label::English: Unskilled labor (no contract employment, e.g. domestic or daily manual labour)
constraint_message::English: Cannot be less than 500 (unless equal to 0) or greater than 100,000AFN.

name: skill_labor_income
label::English: Skilled labor (no contract employment, e.g. carpenter, electrician, mechanic)
constraint_message::English: Cannot be less than 500 (unless equal to 0) or greater than 100,000AFN.

name: formal_employment_income
label::English: Formal employment (with contract)
constraint_message::English: Cannot be less than 500 (unless equal to 0) or greater than 300,000AFN.

name: gov_benefits_income
label::English: Government benefits
constraint_message::English: Cannot be less than 500 (unless equal to 0) or greater than 100,000AFN.

name: hum_assistance_income
label::English: Humanitarian assistance
constraint_message::English: Cannot be less than 500 (unless equal to 0) or greater than 100,000AFN.

name: remittance_income
label::English: Gifts/remittances
constraint_message::English: Cannot be less than 500 (unless equal to 0) or greater than 100,000AFN.

name: loans_income
label::English: Borrowing/loans
constraint_message::English: Cannot be less than 500 (unless equal to 0) or greater than 100,000AFN.

name: asset_selling_income
label::English: Selling household assets
constraint_message::English: Cannot be less than 500 (unless equal to 0) or greater than 100,000AFN.

name: income_check_note
label::English: The total income for the household is under 3,000 AFN, please confirm the previously collected numbers are correct.

name: income_fluctuation
label::English: Did the average monthly (30 days) income from your main income source stay the same for most times in the past year?

name: debt
label::English: Does the household currently have debt?

name: debt_amount
label::English: How much debt does the household currently have, in AFN?
constraint_message::English: Cannot be negative or greater than 500,000AFN.

name: debt_reason
label::English: What was the primary reason behind taking on debt?

name: d2
label::English: Expenditures

name: expenditure_note
label::English: How much was spent in the last 30 days, in AFN, on the following items/costs:

name: food_exp
label::English: Food
constraint_message::English: Cannot be negative or greater than 100,000AFN.

name: water_expt
label::English: Water (drinking)
constraint_message::English: Cannot be negative or greater than 100,000AFN.

name: rent_exp
label::English: Rent and shelter materials/labour
constraint_message::English: Cannot be negative or greater than 100,000AFN.

name: fuel_exp
label::English: Fuel and electricity
constraint_message::English: Cannot be negative or greater than 100,000AFN.

name: debt_exp
label::English: Debt repayment
constraint_message::English: Cannot be negative or greater than 100,000AFN.

name: needs_struggle
label::English: During the past 30 days, did your household struggle to obtain food or did not have enough money to obtain food?

name: d3
label::English: Livelihoods coping

name: lcsi_note
label::English: During the past 30 days, did anyone in your household have to engage in any following behaviours due to a lack of food or a lack of money to buy food?

name: lcsi_migrated
label::English: Migrated to look for work

name: lcsi_more_labour
label::English: Increased daily labour (increase number of days, increase number of working hours)

name: lcsi_sold_natural_resources
label::English: Increased collection and sale of natural resources

name: lcsi_spent_savings
label::English: Spent savings

name: lcsi_sold_assets
label::English: Sold household assets (appliances, furniture, doors, windows, roof beams)

name: lcsi_sold_animals
label::English: Sold more animals than usual or earlier than usual

name: lcsi_borrow
label::English: Borrow food or money for food

name: lcsi_sold_income_gen
label::English: Sold income generating equipment

name: lcsi_less_exp_ag
label::English: Decreased expenditure on fertilizer, pesticide, fodder, animal feed, veterinary care, etc.

name: lcsi_less_exp_services
label::English: Decreased expenditures on health, education, etc.

name: lcsi_sold_land
label::English: Sold house or land

name: lcsi_sold_female_animals
label::English: Sold last female animals

name: lcsi_begging
label::English: Begging/Rely on Charity

name: lcsi_score
calculation: if(${lcsi_emergency_exhausted} > 0 or ${lcsi_emergency_used} > 0, "4", if(${lcsi_crisis_exhausted} > 0 or ${lcsi_crisis_used} > 0, "3", if(${lcsi_stress_exhausted} > 0 or ${lcsi_stress_used} > 0, "2", "1")))

name: E
label::English: AAP + Humanitarian Access

name: aap_note
label::English: Note: In the following couple of questions we will talk about your communication and information about humanitarian assistance in general.

name: info_preference
label::English: What type of information would you like to receive from aid providers?
constraint_message::English: Cannot select "None of the above" and other options.

name: info_adequate
label::English: Do you feel adequately informed about available assistance and how to access it?

name: info_source_preference
label::English: What is your preferred means of receiving information about the humanitarian assistance?

name: feedback_awareness
label::English: Is the household aware of any feedback or complaint mechanisms, to reach aid providers about community needs or assistance received?

name: feedback_awareness_what
label::English: If yes, which mechanisms are you aware of?

name: feedback_preference
label::English: What is the preferred way of communicating with and providing feedback to aid providers about community needs or assistance received?

name: priority_needs
label::English: What are the 3 priority needs of your household?
hint::English: Up to 3 answers possible, but not necessary. Select the applicable options based on the responses of the respondent, do not read out loud.
constraint_message::English: Cannot select "None of the above" and other options.

name: aid_preference
label::English: For households that have a need, what would be the preferred method for receiving assistance?

name: aid_access_issue
label::English: In the past 6 months, were you aware of a humanitarian assistance distribution but could not reach it?

name: aid_access_issue_type
label::English: Why were you unable to access the humanitarian assistance?

name: sim_card
label::English: Does your households own a phone with a sim card that is registered to an individual that is part of your household?

name: bank_account
label::English: Does anyone in your households have a bank account registered to his/her name?

name: F
label::English: Food Security

name: food_security_note
label::English: In the following couple of questions we will talk about your access to and consumption of food. Please remember none of these questions relate to any assistance being provided.

name: f1
label::English: Over the last 7 days, on how many days did household members eat any of the following foods?

name: cereals_tubers
label::English: Rice, bread, potatoes, maize (all cereals & tubers)
constraint_message::English: Must be between 0 and 7 days.

name: pulses_nuts
label::English: Beans, peas, chickepeas, peanuts, cashewnuts, other nuts (all pulses & nuts)
constraint_message::English: Must be between 0 and 7 days.

name: vegetables
label::English: All vegetables
constraint_message::English: Must be between 0 and 7 days.

name: fruit
label::English: All fruits
constraint_message::English: Must be between 0 and 7 days.

name: meat_fish_eggs
label::English: Beef, goat, poultry, eggs, fish, sheep (all meat & fish)
constraint_message::English: Must be between 0 and 7 days.

name: dairy
label::English: Milk, yoghurt (all dairy products)
hint::English: Does NOT include margarine, butter, and small amounts of milk for tea/coffee.
constraint_message::English: Must be between 0 and 7 days.

name: sugars
label::English: Sugar, honey (all sugar products)
constraint_message::English: Must be between 0 and 7 days.

name: oils
label::English: Oil, fat, butter
constraint_message::English: Must be between 0 and 7 days.

name: f2
label::English: Household Hunger Scale

name: no_food_house
label::English: In the past 30 days, was there ever no food to eat of any kind in your house because of lack of resources to get food?

name: no_food_house_freq
label::English: How often did this happen in the past 30 days?
hint::English: Read the options out loud to the respondent.

name: sleep_hungry
label::English: In the past 30 days, did you or any household member go to sleep at night hungry because there was not enough food?

name: sleep_hungry_freq
label::English: How often did this happen in the past 30 days?
hint::English: Read the options out loud to the respondent.

name: whole_day_no_food
label::English: In the past 30 days, did you or any household member go a whole day and night without eating anything at all because there was not enough food?

name: whole_day_no_food_freq
label::English: How often did this happen in the past 30 days?
hint::English: Read the options out loud to the respondent.

name: food_source
label::English: In the past 7 days, what was the primary source of food provision used by the household?

name: market_distance
label::English: How far from your household is this nearest marketplace or grocery store, where you could buy food and non-food items?

name: market_access
label::English: In the past 7 days, have you had access to a marketplace or grocery store in your village or close to your village where you could buy food and non-food items?

name: G
label::English: Nutrition

name: nutrition_note
label::English: You have indicated that you have ${muac_total} children 5 years old or younger but older than six months. With your help and permission, we would like to briefly screen each child for malnutrition in the next step. It�s a brief process and we won't store or share any personal data

name: g1
label::English: Mid-upper Arm Circumference

name: muac_note
label::English: We would now like to measure the mid-upper arm circumference of the ${person_age} year old ${person_sex} child in the household.

name: muac_measurement
label::English: Please measure the nutritional status of child by using the MUAC measurement tool, and write the appropriate answer:
hint::English: Remember to record the measurement in millimeters to the most accurate you can.
constraint_message::English: Cannot be under 80 millimeters or over 200 millimeters.

name: mam_note
label::English: This child has a MUAC between 115mm and 125mm. They should be referred for supplementation as this indicates Moderate Acute Malnutrition.

name: sam_note
label::English: This child has a MUAC under 115mm. They should be immediately referred for treatment as this indicates Severe Acute Malnutrition.

name: rutf_reception
label::English: Has the child been receiving this (show the RUTF/RUSF) in the last 12 months?

name: minimum_dietary_diversity
label::English: Which foods have young children (6-23 months) eaten in the past 24 hours?

name: H
label::English: ESNFI

name: esnfi_note
label::English: In the following questions we want to talk about your current shelter situation.

name: shelter
label::English: What type of shelter does the household currently live in? Please ensure the response is realistic
hint::English: Please ensure the response is realistic

name: rooms
label::English: How many rooms are available in your house, in which household members live?
constraint_message::English: Must be at least 1 and not greater than 20.

name: shelter_damage
label::English: Has the household's shelter been damaged in the last six months due to the following?
constraint_message::English: Cannot select "None of the above" and other options.

name: shelter_damage_extent
label::English: What was the extent of the damage?

name: shelter_damage_repair
label::English: Have you been able to make repairs to your shelter?

name: no_repair_cause
label::English: Why were you unable to make these repairs?

name: shelter_hosted
label::English: Are you hosted by non-displaced members that are from this area and previously owned/rented this shelter?

name: shelter_hosted_why
label::English: What kind of shelter support do support do the displaced household members require while being hosted?

name: tenancy
label::English: What type of tenancy agreement do you have in your current shelter?

name: blankets_number
label::English: How many blankets does your household currently own?
constraint_message::English: Cannot be negative or greater than 30.

name: energy_source
label::English: What is the main source of energy that the household used for heating in the last winter?

name: h1
label::English: Daily NFI access

name: nfi_access_note
label::English: Does your household have daily access or own the following items?

name: sleeping_mats
label::English: Sleeping mats or mattress (basic needs)

name: tarpaulin
label::English: Plastic tarpaulin (basic needs)

name: cooking_pots
label::English: Cooking pots of 5L or more (basic needs)

name: stainless_steel
label::English: Stainless steel cups (basic needs)

name: water_storage
label::English: Water storage containers (cans, buckets with lid, etc.) (basic needs)

name: hygiene_sanitation
label::English: Hygiene / sanitation items (soap, aquatabs) (basic needs)

name: I
label::English: Health

name: health_note
label::English: In the following questions we want to talk about your general access to health facilities.

name: health_facility_affected
label::English: Have any health facilities used by members of your HH become dysfunctional in the past year?

name: health_facility_affected_how
label::English: How have the health facilities been affected?

name: health_facility_reopened
label::English: Did the health facilities remain damaged or closed, or have they since reopened?

name: diarrhea_cases
label::English: How many children under 5 have experienced acute watery diarrhea in the past 2 weeks?
constraint_message::English: Cannot be negative or greater than the number of children aged 5 and under, ${diarrhea_total}.

name: health_facility_distance
label::English: How far is the closest functioning comprehensive health center to your household?

name: health_facility_access
label::English: In the past 3 months, have you had access to a comprehensive health center in your village or close to your village where you could receive healthcare services?

name: health_facility_barriers
label::English: What are the barriers for accessing health care for your household?

name: birth_location
label::English: If pregnant, where have/would women in the household likely give birth?

name: mortality_note
label::English: We are now going to ask you about members of your household who no longer live with you or have died since the beginning of Ramadan, asking about each off these individuals that used to live in the household, if this is okay with you.

name: members_left
label::English: Can you please tell me how many household members have left this household since the beginning of Ramadan this year (no longer currently living in this household)?

name: members_left_note
label::English: We now want to ask about each individual in the household who left, starting with the youngest and ending with the oldest.

name: i1
label::English: Household members that left

name: hh_left_sex
label::English: Sex of household member who left #${hh_member_left}:
hint::English: Household member #1 should always be the head of household

name: hh_left_age
label::English: Age of household member who left #${hh_member_left}:
hint::English: For children less than one year old (i.e. 6 months), put their age as 1
constraint_message::English: Household member cannot be age less than 0 or greater than 130

name: hh_left_joined
label::English: Did this person join the household after the beginning of Ramadan this year?

name: hh_left_born
label::English: Was this person born on or after the beginning of Ramadan this year?

name: members_died
label::English: Can you please tell me how many household members that have died since the beginning of Ramadan this year?

name: members_died_note
label::English: We now want to ask about each individual in the household who died, starting with the youngest and ending with the oldest.

name: i2
label::English: Household members that died

name: hh_died_sex
label::English: Sex of household member who died #${hh_member_died}:
hint::English: Household member #1 should always be the head of household

name: hh_died_age
label::English: Age of household member who died #${hh_member_died}:
hint::English: For children less than one year old (i.e. 6 months), put their age as 1
constraint_message::English: Household member cannot be age less than 0 or greater than 130

name: hh_died_joined
label::English: Did this person join the household after the beginning of Ramadan this year?

name: hh_died_born
label::English: Was this person born on or after the beginning of Ramadan this year?

name: cause_death
label::English: What was the cause of death?

name: J
label::English: WASH

name: wash_note
label::English: Almost done, in the following we would like to talk about access to water, latrines, and trash sites.

name: water_source
label::English: What has been your household's primary source of drinking water over the past 7 days?

name: water_distance
label::English: How far is your primary water source to you?

name: water_damaged
label::English: Have any water sources that your household used been damaged, destroyed, or dried up in the past 6 months and are still not functioning?

name: water_damaged_cause
label::English: What was the cause of the damage or destruction?

name: water_sufficiency
label::English: Overall, was your access to water over the past 7 days enough to meet or satisfy the basic needs of your household members?
hint::English: Read the options out loud to the respondent.

name: water_barriers
label::English: What are the main reasons you are not able to meet your water needs?
constraint_message::English: Cannot select more than 3 options.

name: soap
label::English: Do you have any soap in your household? (if yes, could you show it?)

name: latrine
label::English: What type of latrines has been most commonly used by the household members in the last 7 days?

name: latrine_sharing
label::English: If a community/public latrine, how many households share usage of this latrine?
constraint_message::English: Must be between 1 and 1,000 households.

name: waste_disposal
label::English: What is the main method of waste disposal for your household?

name: K
label::English: Protection

name: protection_note
label::English: Last section! In the following questions we would talk about security, safety, and wellbeing concerns. After this we will have finished.

name: safety
label::English: How would you rate the safety and security of your household in your current location?
hint::English: Read the options out loud to the respondent.

name: adult_prot_incidents
label::English: Were any adults (18 years or older) in your household subject to any of the following protection incidents in the past 3 months?
hint::English: Read the options out loud to the respondent.
constraint_message::English: Cannot select "None of the above" and other options.

name: child_prot_incidents
label::English: Were any children (under 18 years) in your household subject to any of the following protection incidents in the past 3 months?
hint::English: Read the options out loud to the respondent.
constraint_message::English: Cannot select "None of the above" and other options.

name: other_incidents
label::English: Were there any other security or safety incidents in the past 3 months you want to mention?
constraint_message::English: Cannot select "No" and other options.

name: adult_injuries
label::English: Have any adult members of your household (18 years or older) been severely injured in the last 3 months?

name: adult_injuries_cause
label::English: What was the cause of this most severe injury to an adult member?

name: child_injuries
label::English: Have any child members of your household (under 18 years) been severely injured in the last 3 months?

name: child_injuries_cause
label::English: What was the cause of this most severe injury to a child member?

name: adult_tazkira
label::English: How many adult (18 years or older) household members own a Tazkira?
constraint_message::English: Cannot be negative or greater than the total number of adults in the household, ${adult_18_plus_total}.

name: child_tazkira
label::English: How many children (under 18 years) household members own a Tazkira?
constraint_message::English: Cannot be negative or greater than the total number of children in the household, ${under_18_total}.

name: lack_tazkira_reason
label::English: What is the primary reason HH members do not have a Tazkira?

name: displ_explosive_presence
label::English: In the past year, was your household aware of the presence of any explosive hazards (mines, ERWs, PPIEDs) in or closely around your current or most recent previous location?

name: nondispl_explosive_presence
label::English: In the past year, was your household aware of the presence of any explosive hazards (mines, ERWs, PPIEDs) in or closely around your community?

name: explosive_impact
label::English: How did it impact your household?
relevant: selected(${displ_explosive_presence}, "both") or selected(${displ_explosive_presence}, "previous") or selected(${displ_explosive_presence}, "present") or selected(${nondispl_explosive_presence}, "yes")
constraint_message::English: Cannot select "None of the above" and other options.

name: prot_concerns
label::English: In the last 30 days, were household members worried about the following threats in your area?
constraint_message::English: Cannot select "None of the above" and other options.

name: other_concerns
label::English: Were there any other threats that household members were worried about in the last 30 days that you would like to mention?
constraint_message::English: Cannot select "No" and other options.

name: end_note
label::English: Thank you for taking the time to answer this survey.

name: geopoint
label::English: Location
